Messages of greetings exchanged
    Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Foreign minister of the DPRK Paek Nam Sun and Moldovan foreign minister Nicolae Dudeu exchanged messages of greetings on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
 Paek Nam Sun expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop in the future, too, and sincerely wished the Moldovan foreign minister greater success in his work.    
 Nicolae Dudeu hoped that the foreign ministers would make joint efforts with the common hope to develop the bilateral relations in various domains and explore a new possibility of cooperation in the interests of the two peoples.

New feature film released
    Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The Korean Film Studio recently released new feature film "A Waiting Girl."
 The film portrays a heroine looking after the native home of a soldier with a pure heart and love for soldiers of the Korean People's Army, which impressively shows how young people should love each other in the era of the army-based policy.    
 The film stresses that the love of young people will beautifully shine when it is based on the spirit of the era of the army-based policy and that it is in fuller bloom under the loving care of leader Kim Jong Il.
